snippet: An unmanned Army surveillance blimp carrying sensitive technology broke loose from its mooring at the military’s Aberdeen Proving Ground in Maryland and floated over Pennsylvania for hours with two fighter planes tracking it.
abstract: Unmanned army surveillance blimp breaks loose from where it was secured at Aberdeen Proving Ground in Maryland and travels over Pennsylvania, dragging its tether across power lines and causing outages before coming to rest in town of Muncy.
lead_paragraph: An unmanned Army surveillance blimp carrying sensitive technology broke loose from its mooring at the military’s Aberdeen Proving Ground in Maryland and floated over Pennsylvania for hours with two fighter planes tracking it.

headline.print_headline: An Escapee From Maryland, Military Blimp Flees to Pennsylvania
headline.main: An Escapee From Maryland, Military Blimp Flees to Pennsylvania
